item.title: Blocked drain outside 36 St Stephens Road, 29th April
item.description:
The drain is completely full of compacted soil and other detritus meaning that even small amounts of rain cause flooding to the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 34, Saint Stephen's Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Pavement breaking up, 29th April
item.description:
The pavement is breaking up and uneven (and not just at this section). It is hazardous to elderly people using wheelchairs, mobility scooters and walking aids. There have been quite a few complaints about this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Saint Stephen's Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 10" pothole at entrance of road with further numerous potholes into Hurst Close, 29th April
item.description:
Pot hole 10" and growing at the junction of Hurst Close and Paygrove Lane. Further numerous potholes down the full length of Hurst Close and one large pothole on Paygrove Lane on the Northbound carraigeway just before Hurst Close. Potholes have been growing consistantly for several months.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hurst Close, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Smashed glass bottle on grass and path through andoversford park, 29th April
item.description:
Andoversford park down by the park just past the steep part

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Andoversford, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The sign is illegible problem, 29th April
item.description:
No signs or warnings to say the road is closed this end, or road ahead closed with arrow on Runnings road. Vehicles are turning into the road and driving so far down, realising the road is closed. Then they are turning in the entrance to Spirax Sarco. This is dangerous, especially with HGVs being driven in and out of this entrance. Caller is worried something is going to happen, if this continues.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very large old tree that sheds branches and dead wood regularly on paths causing issues to elderly residents using mobility scooters trying to use paths etc. also there are very close to property roofs and top windows and worried they might break and cause damage also lots of cables/telephone lines within the branches., 29th April
item.description:
On the grass verge adjacent to 20/22/24/26 Minetts Avenue, GL52 8JT
